prompt: Centered portrait of a professional male bullion dealer standing confidently in a character-rich vault, surrounded by metal shelving, lockboxes, and hints of classic automotive heritage. Industrial editorial style with cool-neutral palette and organic yellow accents from safety gear or tools. Authentic workshop lighting, visible evidence of ongoing work, subtle oil stains, and worn surfaces. Medium framing with natural, thoughtful expression and hands resting casually near vintage parts or ledgers. Matte finish, purposeful negative space, and layered depth with vault architecture framing the subject.

Centered portrait of a professional female silver refiner in a gritty, authentic industrial facility. She is surrounded by workbenches, metal tools, and classic car components, with warm accent lighting from a work lamp and cool daylight filtering through windows. Her expression is focused, showing pride and concentration, with hands engaged in examining a part or holding a measuring tool. Workshop atmosphere with visible signs of active projects, subtle yellow pops from equipment, and matte, desaturated tones. Editorial documentary style with layered composition and respectful eye-level perspective.

Centered portrait of a professional male metals trader in a modern yet characterful office with classic car memorabilia and restoration elements visible. He stands confidently near a worktable with automotive parts, vintage reference books, and tools, illuminated by natural and practical lighting. Cool grays and machined neutrals dominate, with an accent of yellow from a measuring tape or safety vest. His expression is calm and purposeful, hands engaged with documents or parts, background showing authentic workspace organization and creative energy. Matte finish, medium-close framing, and layered depth.

Centered portrait of a professional female bullion vault manager in a restoration workshop-inspired environment, surrounded by organized shelves, hand tools, and automotive parts. She stands with a composed, thoughtful expression, hands resting on a workbench or examining a precision part. Workshop lighting with cool-neutral base and warm highlights from task lamps or daylight. Subtle yellow details from safety gear or measuring devices. Editorial style, medium framing with natural stance, visible evidence of ongoing projects, and matte, desaturated processing for authentic character.

Centered portrait of a professional male precious metals buyer on a workshop-style trading floor, surrounded by classic automotive parts, worn workbenches, and hand tools. He stands confidently with a focused, collaborative expression, hands holding a part or referencing a ledger. Industrial editorial lighting, cool-neutral palette with organic pops of yellow from workshop equipment. Layered composition, medium framing with visible evidence of active restoration work, natural negative space, and a matte, documentary finish.
